r.s: Provides access to the Yahoo! Web Services
r.d: Services_Yahoo provides object-oriented interfaces to the web service capabilities of Yahoo
r.n: * Changed API for search interfaces to a fluent interface. This means that with this release the API changes significantly and is not compatible to older version of this package. The context analysis interface is not yet affected by this change. Expect this to happen in a future release. * Switched from XML to Serialized PHP as the internal data encoding format.
